name: search_on_ebay
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ebay_search_result.
Tool description: API Returns necessary information from Ebay search page results, such as the price, title, shipping cost and direct url to the product 
API description: Searches for items on eBay using the provided search query and RapidAPI key.

searchquery.description: The search term used to look for items on eBay.
